title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When reproducing the steps mentioned in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
4. Choose 'Open With...' -> 'Default Text Editor'.

Observed Behavior:
- Nothing happens; it does not open a new editor for the file.
- Instead, it reactivates the scripted resource editor example that was used by default for XML files.

The expected behavior is that a new editor should open for the file since the selected editor type is different from the one already open.
